captions.text: -I decided we have to break up. You know, it's summer time. We can get back together in September.
-Tell something to you daughter, her boyfriend just broke up with her!
-What can I say? I think he's right!
-You know what? I'll see you in September!
-Don't even think about it! It's mine!
-Can you give it back to me?
-Nicola, you finally parked your car, are you sweat?
-Not too much just a little. It was hotter yesterday.
-But I think I'll come here at night
-And Barbara D'Urso's book "The Sun Will Come Out Anyway"?
-I was think that on the 18th we can go to the water theme park
-Are you crazy? I'll still have my period
-So you know what? You can go
-Amazing! So you can go f*°ç youself together!
-Mirko I think you're exaggerating with the air conditioning
-So it's not just me being too cold...Piero, help...I can't feel  my testicles
-Hey, sorry I was watching you I had to approach...what are you reading?
-Okay so I ate 3 hours ago...I'll have to eat again in 3 hours
-But I'm a little hungry...I'll eat roasted chicken!
-Okay but when I told you "bring the watermelon" I meant at the beach, not in you!
-You said to put it somewhere fresh
-You have to stop it now. I'm paying the bills here
-I envy you, you ate like there was no tomorrow in the past few months and you don't worry about your body
-Yeah I found a solution! Come take a swim!
-Okay you can put something over there and the pool here. Are we sure it's not unauthorized?
-Don't worry, the alderman is a friend of mine. We're in Italy after all.
-Anna, c'mon we have to go to the beach!
-I told you I have to shave my legs and you won't stress me out any longer, is that clear?
-Body hair is fashion in the Englad
-Do you think we live in Englamd?
-Did I forget to put the lotion somewhere?
-No! It's cold and I can't swim and there are sharks in there!
-Fashion of the summer: bracelets wore like you're a jerk, trunks wore like you're a jerk
-This waterproof cover for the phone is amazing
-I think there's something wrong with mine. Hold on I think mom is calling
-I told you, there is no point going to the gym, there's always someone worse than you
-That today is a beautiful day! Good morning and you're really in great shape!
-Nico, come here! I am wearing my new swimsuit and Gabriele's wearing his!
-I told you, I don't know them
-No it's too far I can't make it
